creator: Entropik Technologies Pvt Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Affect Lab is a user research platform powered by Emotion AI technologies of Facial Coding and Eye Tracking.

Using the phone's front camera, the app allows user researchers to capture non-verbal cues like facial expressions and eye gaze movements of their tester panel.

The app is also enabled with Screen Recording and Surveys, allowing testers to participate in end-to-end studies in real-time.

The app can be used to test mobile apps, mobile browser sites, and desktop sites on phone.

Affect Lab is primarily used by user researchers to test videos, Ads, Content, Print Ads, Trailer, Episode, Digital Banner Ads on phone. The phone’s front camera is sufficient to capture both facial expressions and eye gaze data with more than 90% accuracy.

The data captured through facial coding, eye tracking, and survey features on the app are translated into actionable insights on Entropik Tech’s Affect Lab platform. The data syncs in real-time and the insights are readily available for analysis and download. These actionable insights can be used by user researchers to make recommendations on improving and humanizing Content and Media across web and mobile platforms. All data transfer happens in the background thus saving up to 4X on research turnaround time (TAT).

Here’s an exhaustive list of features the app supports currently:

1. Eye Tracking Solo Tests

Tester must calibrate their eyes before they are exposed to the stimuli so that accurate insights like heat maps and gaze maps can be generated
13 dot calibration screen is shown to the user for calibrating
Tester's calibration needs to be at least 90% accurate before they can proceed to take the test

2. Facial Coding Solo Tests

Facial calibration is done before the tester is exposed to the stimuli
As part of facial calibration, the app checks if the tester's face is properly visible and if the tester is sitting in a well-lit area

3. Facial Coding & Eye Tracking Combo Tests

Both Facial and Eye-tracking calibrations are done before exposing the tester to the stimuli under test

4. Eye tracking Insights on Affect Lab Platform

Heat maps available in Insights
Transparency plots available in Insights
Gaze maps available in Insights
AOIs can be drawn to deep dive into each media

5. Emotions Captured

Happy
Surprise
Sad
Anger
Disgust
Contempt
Fear
Neutral
descriptionShort: Affect Lab is a user research platform powered by Emotion AI technologies

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Features included in this release:
User can click on the URL or enter Tester id to Login
User should enable their camera to begin the test
User sees the Face Mask Screen before taking the test to capture the facial emotions
User sees the Eye Tracking Calibration before taking the test to capture the eye gaze
Stimuli Viewing
